channel.title: I need pic help
channel.description:
ok well i need help putting my pic on the formus i know how to take it but how do i put it in the formus here?? any1 know??
thanks :)

item.title: I need pic help
item.dc:creator: @chewwie chewwie
item.description:
@chewwie wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:3, topic:71619”]OK, lets say I wanted to take a picture of your post and post it here.

Heres what I would do:

  1. Press print screen

  2. Open up paint and do Edit -> Paste

  3. Crop the image (optional)

  4. Save it as whatever.png

  5. Go to http://imageshack.us/

  6. Upload it

  7. Copy the “Direct link to image” url

  8. Start your post

  9. Now, where you want your picture to be, add [img]Picture url here[/img]

  10. Post, and your done

Results:

Blah Blah Blah

[/quote]

ok thanks bra ill try it now[br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2007, 04:19:13 PM[/size][hr]

Read full topic

item.title: I need pic help
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

OK, lets say I wanted to take a picture of your post and post it here.

Heres what I would do:

  1. Press print screen

  2. Open up paint and do Edit -> Paste

  3. Crop the image (optional)

  4. Save it as whatever.png

  5. Go to http://imageshack.us/

  6. Upload it

  7. Copy the “Direct link to image” url

  8. Start your post

  9. Now, where you want your picture to be, add [img]Picture url here[/img]

  10. Post, and your done

Results:

Blah Blah Blah
